I^[![profile](profile.jpg)Photo taken by Saha Vishwanath at [teamLab Borderless Shanghai](https://borderless.teamlab.art/shanghai/).] am a third-year PhD student at [Northwestern University](https://www.northwestern.edu/), fortunate to be advised by Professor [Matthew Kay](https://www.mjskay.com/) and Professor [Jason Hartline](https://sites.northwestern.edu/hartline/). 

Before joining Northwestern, I was a student at [William & Mary](https://www.wm.edu/), where I majored in Computer Science and Economics.

## Research

I am broadly interested in building tools and theory for robust information visualization. I have also been working on questions that involve more economics and fairness concerns.

My CV (last updated Mar 2023) is [here](https://mika-long.github.io/grad_cv.pdf).
